resources.string: Sei sicuro di voler disinstallare %1$s apps?
Copia il nome del pacchetto negli appunti
Per favore, installa Shizuku e autorizza Canta.
Si prega di consentire l\'accesso a Shizuku per Canta.

Canta is an open source uninstaller app that uses Shizuku to remove system and user apps.
It allows you to debloat your device as you wish, no PC required.

Special thanks to %s.
Canta would't be the same without their work.
Automatically fetch new version of app bloat info. This guarantees up-to-date badges and app descriptions.

This app provides app removal recommendations based on third-party information. These recommendations are informational in nature and do not guarantee safety or compatibility with your specific device. Uninstalling system apps can cause unexpected issues, including but not limited to: loss of functionality, system instability, device bootloops, data loss, etc. The developer of this app is not responsible for any damage done to your device resulting from following the recommendations provided.
Cliccando \"Procedi\", acconsenti all\'utilizzo di quest\'app a tuo rischio.
Indica se mostrare la finestra di dialogo per confermare l\'azione di disinstallazione.
Tocca %d più volte per abilitare la selezione di tutte le funzionalità.
Select all has been enabled for filter type \"Recommended\".
